synopsis.text: Takagiâ€™s world is a whirlwind of absurdity, filled with eccentric characters and their intertwined stories. From the hapless Takagi, who finds himself the object of the relentless and inappropriate advances of the school nurse, Ms. Shitara, to the talking cat, Sushi, who embarks on a series of ill-fated careers, this anime is a rollercoaster of comedic misadventures. The accident-prone Takagi frequently finds himself in the school infirmary, much to Ms. Shitara's delight, while Sushi's job attempts, from being a sushi chef to a space explorer, always end in disaster. Meanwhile, the kindergarten teacher Kitamura grapples with her past, and a family's hamster struggles with communication issues. This anime, with its roots in four-frame comics, maintains a fast-paced and silly narrative that will leave you laughing at its sheer absurdity.
